job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 120-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Developing cloud-native backends and implementing data processing algorithms using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
Back-end Principal Engineer, Trilogy (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 120-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Developing cloud-native backends and implementing data processing algorithms using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on back-end development and cloud-native architecture, with no specific mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. While it mentions data processing algorithms, it lacks the core elements required for ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: Review code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe core software engineering activities, including building backend systems, implementing algorithms, and ensuring code quality, which fall under general software development.

While not exclusively data engineering, the implementation of data processing algorithms can be considered a component of data engineering, especially in the context of preparing data for further use.

The mention of serverless cloud patterns, particularly within the context of AWS, touches upon operational aspects of cloud infrastructure management, which is a component of MLOps, though not explicitly stated as such.

phrases: Excel and you'll face a decisive interview
soft_skills.justification: The language used emphasizes tackling challenges, achieving excellence, and unleashing potential, which aligns with a problem-solving and pragmatic approach to work.

phrases: Showcase your skills, not just your resume
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'Showcase your skills' and 'Take on our challenges' suggest a desire for individuals who take initiative and ownership of their work.
The requirement to work with the 'latest' patterns implies a need for continuous learning and adaptability to new technologies.
